__e: All the time you used to talk to me about witchcraft and darkness and the like,
With Witchcraft on our side, we can get anything we bloody well want.
I'm a God-fearing Christian. I don't believe in this sorcery stuff, anyway.
I left Will alone to work his sorcery, and he left me to mine.
Look, either you believe in witchcraft and you're scared for my safety or you don't.
You use your witchy ways an mae my two favorite people fall for you.
